data: It was a cold raw evening in February as I sat in the coffee-room of the Old Plough in Cheltenham, “Lucullus c. Lucullo”—no companion save my half-finished decanter of port.
Old Plough | Cheltenham | Lucullus c. Lucullo
It was a cold raw evening in February as I sat in the coffee-room of the Old Plough in Cheltenham, "Lucullus c. Lucullo"--no companion save my half-finished decanter of port.
The Confessions of Harry Lorrequer — Volume 2
Lever, Charles James, 1806-1872; Browne, Hablot Knight, 1815-1882 [Illustrator]
